title: not in club but im club leader
body: so i would like to know if anyone knows how to fix this if possible i am the leader of a club that i made before the clubs when down and i changed my name during the time they when down all the other people in the club are still in it but I'm not when i went to my friends house she showed me the club and my account is still in there but on my league I'm not anyone know how to fix this ??

replies.body: Same here. My club is inactive though so I don't really mind.
Same problem ! Club members can see me inside the club but i appear offline. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Im having the same problem.

Also, i am unable to see any club tags. even the ones of my own club on my friends.
anyone else getting this?

i was just going to post this and its happening to me ;(
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
